name: bird-box
description: Update a pinned gist to contain the latest tweets of a Twitter user.

name: waka-box
description: Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly WakaTime stats.

description: Update a pinned gist to contain your YTD exercise metrics from Strava.

name: music-box
description: Update a pinned gist to contain your weekly listening report on Last.fm.

description: Update a pinned gist to contain your daily productivity stats from RescueTime.

description: Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity from AniList.

name: douban-box

name: todoist-box
description: Update a pinned gist to contain your Todoist stats.

name: activity-box
description: Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity of a GitHub user.

name: gist-box
description: A helper class for updating single-file Gists.
